If you enjoyed what you heard or were challenged, please leave us a review.
We'll help other people find us. If you have questions or a topic you'd like to hear
discussed, shoot me an email at info at southspring.org. Reconstructed faith is a
resource of South spring Baptist church. Remember, don't give up trust God search for answers.
